name: Amalgamare
description:
Amalgamare is an episodic indie horror experience with more episodes to come!
Controls:
WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
Z to interact
ENTER to talk with NPCs
SPACEBAR to Attack


In Episode 1 of Amalgamare:

In this 2D horror adventure game, play as the protagonist May as she is siphoned into a horrific new world on Halloween night. In a brave feat of love for her cat Matilda, May embarks on a mysterious and gruesome journey through an otherworldly environment where she must utilize clues and interactions to find her way out. Control May’s journey from a mysterious sewer maze into a grotesque mansion while simultaneously unraveling the secretes within.

EXPLORE your environment

INTERACT with objects and entities

FIGHT off monsters

DISCOVER the secrets of the mansion


Character Descriptions:

Often the target of her friend’s ridicule, May is a reclusive young girl who finds solace mainly in her cat Matilda whom she found 6 months prior to the start of the story in a dumpster. May had a humble upbringing with her friends Bea and Max, but as they grew older, her friends began to look down on her for being different and coming from a lower-class family.

Bea is a young girl who treats May poorly despite being very close with her from a young age and has grown to exploit their friendship as they have gotten older. After her father got a better-paying job, Bea’s family moved away from May’s neighborhood and began to ditch May for a more popular crowd.

Max becomes friends with May and Bea later in their friendship but teams up against May when it comes to ridiculing her for her introverted nature. He is a hotheaded and privileged individual who often does not understand the discrepancies between his situation and the circumstances of others.
